title: Applying Rules of Probability
body: Felicity attends Modesto JC in Modesto, CA. The probability that Felicity enrolls in a math class is $$0.2$$ and the probability that she enrolls in a speech class is $$0.65$$. The probability that she enrolls in a math class GIVEN that she enrolls in a speech class is $$0.25$$. Let M $$=$$ math class, S $$=$$ speech class, M|S $$=$$ math given speech.
